sakai:title: BrightCove - Find all videos
sakai:shortDescription: Find all videos in BrightCove using a read token.
sakai:description: This proxy will get the public contacts from a user.

This template requires an API key. It can be defined at ./load/org.sakaiproject.nakamura.proxy.ProxyClientServiceImpl.cfg
